product.title: BKIND Hand Balm Balsam, Pine & Cedar in Multi
product.body_html: Made from a mix of deeply nourishing ingredients, BKIND hand balm moisturizes, soothes, repairs, and promotes tissue healing. All those powerful natural ingredients come together as a winning formula to keep your hands soft, young and protected. The balm contains balsam, pine and cedar essentials oils.
